thread.title: Ed Sheeran Donates Superman Boxers for Charity
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran Donates Superman Boxers for Charity

title: Ed Sheeran Donates Superman Boxers for Charity
text:
Photos Ed Sheeran | File AP 
LONDON: Singer Ed Sheeran has donated his blue Superman boxers to an auction firm to help raise money and recognition for the breast cancer awareness organisation CoppaFeel. 
Heather Walters, who was diagnosed with breast cancer last year, is holding the auction night in Woolacombe in England, reports mirror.co.uk. 
Walters has already raised more than 12,000 pounds for the awareness charity by asking women to donate their brassieres and now she's roped in celebrities. 
She has roped in celebrities like Fearne Cotton, Kelly Brook, Nick Grimshaw and Cara Delevingne, along with sports stars and the cast of "Hollyoaks" to raise as much money as possible for the cause. 
â€œEven if some of them only sell for a fiver, it wouldn't matter to me. It's going to be a symbolic night where everyone who's helped me with this is going to be in one room," Walters said.
